tags: None
review: I had consulted the doctor and it was for health concern. Consultation was really good by the doctor. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. Medicine was suggested by the doctor. Tests was done and I had surgery later. There was waiting time in the hospital. It was gynecology's related. It was minor issue. I am recovering now health wise, she was shy to express regarding certain things. I have plans to viist again doctor next month.

tags: None
review: I had been to hospital and it was for health issue. ****** *** **** ****. I would like to recommend this doctor to other people if anyone asks.  Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. Scanning reports she checked. It was gynecology-related consultation. Medicine was prescribed by the doctor. Diet and exercise she told to follow.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I do not recommend this doctor to anyone.

I waited till 3 hours 30 minutes to consult with her, & when my time came she just took 3 minutes to speak, no further explanation only asked for test, and mentioned " make sure you do these tests only from Manipal Hospital for good result "..... 
I asked for any medicine she confirmed to continue with same medicine recommended by other doctor verbally which I was already taking, when I asked to mention in prescription she refused and asked to come with all the test results then only she will prescribe the medicines..time nd fund both wasted..!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She does pay attention to detail, she is in very hurry and im-patiant, does not bother to explain the problem. Just prescribes the list of tests. Manipal hospital is very good but

tags: None
review: I had consulted the doctor and it was for health concern. ********* *** **** ** *** ******. I have plans to go again soon. I would like to recommend this doctor to other people if anyone asks. Iron tablets was prescribed by doctor. Medical tests were also done near my home. There was no waiting time in the hospital. I was planning for second child so met doctor. Doctor was friendly with me during the consultation. Doctor told me to have healthy food.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited her as my wife was suffering health issues. The doctor is  amazing, she did a proper diagnosis of the issues and didn't recommend any medications till she properly understood the issue. When the actual reasons were found she recommended a procedure, only after that she did recommend any medicines. The doctor is very friendly, she explained everything to us in detail, she even tried to make the entire process hassle free. 

Very good experience, I would recommend the doctor.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: A very patient friendly persona, took the time to answer all our queries with a smile. The follow up after the surgery was very encouraging and satisfying. An excellent gynaecologist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: She is too good . Extremely practical and gives the best advice. She is very professional and values time. So she speaks to the point and addresses the concerns of the patient. I am extremely satisfied with her and I highly recommend her.

tags: None
review: The doctor was very patient overall and tried to understand the patient history thoroughly. She made us feel very comfortable.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I was in consultation with Dr Rekha. During my third trimester she advised me to get few tests done however in my next consultation she did not ask anything about the tests reports...It was when I asked about the test reports she realised she had to check it. Besides being expensive, these tests are very vital and its important to get right medication if there are any abnormalties. She definetly needs to be more vigilant about the patient history.
